UploadService.description: This is the schema definition for the Upload Service. It represents the properties for the service itself and has links to collections of other resources (TBD).
UploadService.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent an Upload Service for a Redfish OEM API implementation. It represents the properties that affect the service itself.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

HttpPushUri.description: The URI used to perform an HTTP or HTTPS push update to the Update Service.
HttpPushUri.longDescription: This property shall contain a URI at which the UpdateService supports an HTTP or HTTPS POST of a software image for the purpose of installing software contained within the image.

ServiceEnabled.description: This indicates whether this service is enabled.
ServiceEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether this service is enabled.

title: #UpdateService.v1_2_1.UpdateService
